Tab which is displayed on start up

Widget can be used to track locally the balance on the prepaid Bus Plus card. Simply set the balance and use the widget to track the remaining credit. Widget can not track the real balance on the card (it's not possible at the moment), and it will show only the amount you set and maintain it to.

To add a widget, long press on home screen (desktop) and choose Widgets > BusPlus balance. A small (1x1) widget will be added. On each tap at the widget, balance will be reduced for a single ticket fare, until there is not enough credit for it.

To set balance to new value, either tap on widget with low credit or go to Settings > Widget > Balance and set it there.

You can set the ticket fare (tariff zone) in Settings > Tariff zone. Ask around which tariff is appropriate for which line.

To change the style of the widget, look under Settings > Widget style, and choose one of them.

You can change the color of the icon for your home launcher shortcuts. Go to Settings and check Custom icon color. Then set the icon hue using the seek bar. To reset the hue, tap on icon preview.\n\nNow, each new shortcut will use the set icon color. To change it again, go to the settings and change the hue. To reset it, uncheck the Custom icon color.

BusPlus is unofficial Android app that simplifies the use of the BusPlus (mass transit system in Belgrade) USSD service that shows how far is the next bus from your station.

IMPORTANT: After six months of free use, charging has begun for this USSD info service, starting with September 16th 2012. For users of Telekom and Vip mobile networks, rate is 2,95 RSD per query, while users of Telenor network will have to pay 3,54 RSD.

Service takes station codes as an input, and app tries to streamline this so you can query the service without the knowledge of correct code.

Station codes can be listed either by their names or line numbers (which use said stations along their route).

Additionally, app can plot station positions on a map, along with your current location (retrieved from GPS).

Stations can be added to Favorites list for a much quicker later use. This list is persisted across the updates, so there is no fear it will be lost (unless you deliberately uninstall it).

Many options can be changed under Settings menu on first tab. Similarly, much of the functionality is under option menus on each tab.

GENERIC WAIVER OF LIABILITY (from busplus.rs)

Data which info service provide for estimated arrival time of vehicle to the station, or distance of vehicle from it, represent indicated information based on last known status of the vehicle in the mass transit system of Belgrade (ITS1 and ITS2) and used equipment. While there have been extensive measures taken in order to provide the most accurate information, real world deviations are still possible because of tehnical and operational limitations of the system. Provider will not be held accountable for consequences one might suffer because of information obtained using the service.
This app was open to optional donations, but because of absolute lack of interest it isn\'t anymore. Developer will continue to support and update the app in his free time.
Set your balance to new value
Set your balance to new value:
To add a widget, long press on your home screen and choose Widget>BusPlus Balance. One tap on widget reduces your balance by a single ticket fare.\n
The following USSD query will charge your phone bill! For carrier \"%1$s\" rate is %2$s RSD per query.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
The following USSD query will charge your phone bill! For carrier \"%1$s\" rate is unknown (approximately 4 RSD per query).\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
